content.text:
# Golden Rooster Award for Best Supporting Actress

| country       = China
| year          = 1981
| year2         = 2023
| holder_label     = Winner (2022)
| holder           =  Qi Xi for Nice View
| website = [https://www.cgrhfff.com/ Golden Rooster Awards]
| previous         = 35th
| main             = 36th Golden Rooster Awards
| next             = 37th
}}
Golden Rooster for Best Supporting Actress () is the main competition category of the Golden Rooster Awards. It is awarded to supporting actresses who have outstanding performance in motion pictures.
